page.title:
HTTP Binding
HTTP Binding
page.normal_text:
“A mechanism for using HTTP transport in the context of an XML Protocol. This does not mean that HTTP is the only transport mechanism ..., nor that support for HTTP transport is mandatory. … merely addresses the fact that HTTP transport is expected to be widely used, …..”
“A mechanism for using HTTP transport in the
context of an XML Protocol. This does not mean
that HTTP is the only transport mechanism ..., nor
that support for HTTP transport is mandatory. …
merely addresses the fact that HTTP transport is
expected to be widely used, …..”
